name: as long as we're together
description:
Faith and Lucy are best friends.  They're also magical girls Sweet and Pure!

As Long As We're Together is a very small visual novel about friendship between two girls who also happen to be magical girls.  Made for the friendship jam!  A single play through is about five minutes, but with lots of variation so you can play the game multiple times.

This is currently the jam version of the game which is narratively complete but with some of the backgrounds being missing.  Of course there was a lot of stuff that I wanted to add but ran out of time!
